Room.Name: Netherworld Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking on Netherworld Lane, admiring the beautiful city.
Room.LongDescription: A new building is on the north side of the street, and as you look closer, you see it is a retail store which specializes in coffins. Several of the more ornate models are standing just outside the door. Customers are encouraged pick one out now, while they can enjoy it.
